The video was shared on Facebook on Dece: 2019, and has been viewed more than 2,900 times.
In the video: a large group of men wearing Dastars, a style of turban worn by some Sikhs, can be seen chanting slogans as they march across a bridge wielding swords and sticks.
The misleading Facebook post claimed tha: 4. The video was found to have been circulating online since at least May 2016, unrelated to the NRC, and was reported to be a protest called by Sikh organizations in response to a Hindu nationalist party's proposals for a public gathering in Amritsar.
